text:
Champions League
Qualified PSG, Real Madrid rolls out ... the evening results in the Champions League
Discover all the results of this first evening of the Champions League including the scores of PSG, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich or Juventus Turin.
06 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Antoine Chirat



Fourth day of the Champions League, part two! After the first part of yesterday, groups A, B, C and D made their verdict on Wednesday, November 6th. From the move from Bruges to Paris, from the match between Real Madrid and Galatasaray to the move from Juventus Turin to Moscow, see the full results of the evening, below.




Evening results




Mauro Icardi + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


Group A

PSG 1-0 BrugesReal Madrid 6-0 Galatasaray

Group B

Bayern Munich 2-0 Olympiacos Red Star 0-4 Tottenham

Group C

Dinamo Zagreb 3-2 DonetskAtalanta Bergamo 1-1 Manchester City

Group D

Lokomotiv Moscow 1-2 Juventus TurinBayer Leverkusen 2-1 Atl√©tico Madrid
